subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Four months after his United States Open victory, Tiger Woods returned to Torrey Pines without a limp. Hopping from a cart, Woods walked up to John Abel, 59, doffed his cap and extended his hand. “Hey, I hear you’re looking for a caddie. I’m Tiger Woods — pleased to meet you.”.
